tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Made a special video for PewDie! If you guys liked it give me a﻿ thumb up! Thx, -Slendy
I seriously wonder what Pewdie's childhood was like. hmm﻿
I love at part 06:25 XD Laughed so﻿ Hard!!
u﻿ play xbox

@ Pewdiepie I hope﻿ you fall off a cliff because then I will know that your million plus followers (tween fucktards) will be right behind you and the world will become a lighter place. You are not funny, cute or endearing. You and your mindless tweenage following are spreading like a virus contaminating everything it comes into contact with. Your monstrous shrieking, stupid accent and constant banter are poisoning the collective so please STOP you narcissistic FUCKTARD.
tobuscus played the﻿ pewdiepie stairs too
How to﻿ play snake game on a YouTube video 1.Press the left button 2.Press up button while pressing left button 3. Have fun :)
do you know anything about﻿ timezones?
I ♥ His Random﻿ Rapping - 4:16 ;)
I like﻿ trains
Incest is wrong!﻿ Thumb up!
00:13 Pewdie so cute !﻿ hahahah XD
that lady﻿ made the witch sound from l4d2/l4d
Well, excuse me for not living in the same timezone as﻿ him...
i live in﻿ italy....
Dude I'm watching them at 5 in the morning.﻿
I'm laughing so hard I feel like I'm gonna vomit... oh god.﻿ WHY IS THIS GAME SO FUNNY.
Are you wearing the "Razer-ELECTRA" headset? if yes, ive﻿ got the same :D
happy anniversary then pewdiepie﻿
I love watching his videos at two in the morning....﻿
5:55 I like myself who's a ... BIG﻿ FUCKING SNAKE
you rock pewdiepie!!!﻿
Hitler and Satan wore a﻿ suit.
idiots,he's﻿ in italy.....it was 7:26 a.m. 3 hours ago.....
PEWDIEPIE PLS PLAY MY LEVEL ITS called PEWDIEPIEIBEGUPLAYTIS PLS I﻿ BEG U
